Container.Name: nextcloudpi
Container.Overview:
This is a template for the Nextcloudpi docker container, this is an all in one solution for someone wanting to run Nextcloud on their unRaid server. More information can be found here: https://ownyourbits.com/ https://hub.docker.com/r/ownyourbits/nextcloudpi
Before hitting start, select advanced view in the top right corner, add your servers IP address e.g. 192.168.1.5 or the IP of the container if you specify a unique one.
Container.PostArgs: Enter server or container IP here e.g. 192.168.1.5
